Created: Nov. 9th, 2009

Tags:

 

  • Kermit The Reporter for Sesame Street News

    Hi-ho, Kermit the Frog here, reporting for Sesame Street News

  • Kermit Becomes Lady Gaga's Coat

    How many more Kermit's have to die just so Lady Gaga can look good?

  • Kermit Marries Miss Piggy

    You knew it would happen eventually.

  • Kermit Sings "It's Not Easy Being Green"

    Is there anyone out there who hasn't heard this song? There is something so hauntingly stoic about Kermit's lyrics that makes me want buy him a beer.

  • Kermit and Big Bird Get High

    One of the oldest, and probably the best, internet memes of all time.

    The audio clip features Big Bird and Kermit sitting around, getting baked and talking nonsense. It's hilarious - and a little disturbing.
